title: Is it unreasonable to expect my Pixel bought new in March 2017 to still be working?
content:
My Pixel is slowing self-destructing.
I've noticed the battery life deteriorate over time but for the past month or so it can only last less than 5 minutes not plugged into a charger. 
It has been repeatedly freezing (including during phone calls) and sometimes it will freeze, I will switch it off, turn it back on and it will freeze again up to 10 times.  
The newest issue has been with the speakers, particularly during calls where I either can't hear my phone ringing as I try and call someone or they can't hear me talking - it also affected media and alarms.

I expect more from a phone I paid over $1000 for which is less than 2 years and 3 months old!
